Metadata.title: Flock Store - Order Tracking
Metadata.description: Track your orders in real-time with Flock Store

TrackingForm.title: Track Your Order
TrackingForm.description: Enter your order number and email to track your order

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notFound: Order not found. Please check your order number and email.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again in {seconds} seconds.
errors.trackingRetryFailed: Unable to fetch tracking information after multiple attempts. Please try again later.
errors.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeout: The request timed out. Please try again.

statusMessages.CREATED: We are working to deliver your order in the next 24-48 hours
statusMessages.SHIPPED: Your order is on its way! Track the delivery above
statusMessages.COMPLETED: Your order has been successfully delivered
statusMessages.INCIDENCE: There is an issue with your order. Please contact support
statusMessages.RETURN: A return has been initiated for this order
